title: Find the regatta
directions: Our Regatta takes place on Friars Meadow, where parking is available for spectators, trailers and competitors. Access to the meadow is from Edgworth Road (CO10 2TL), from a small lane on the left-hand-side.

addresses.title: Regatta
addresses.address:
Friars Meadow
Edgeworth Road
Sudbury
Suffolk CO10 2TL
